name: Hungry Frog (itch) (A1exdV)
description:
Hi!

This is my game about a hungry frog who loves flies very much.

Is a endless platformer. The goal is to live as much as possible until time runs out.  Eating flys give you extra time. Spikes will take away time.

You can jump up to 3 tiles up. Min jump 1 tile.

Control:

A/DGo left and rightSpaceJumpEEat flys

Credits:

Background music were taken from sonatina's midi madness variety pack.

Frog sprites were taken from Eli Haun's Frog Platformer Tileset.

Tiles, bg, and in game objects were taken from Free Swamp 2D Tileset Pixel Art.

Some of assets are slightly modified. 

I had a lot of fun creating this game. 

I hope you enjoy it : )

Game was created for Mini Jam 106: Frogs²
